content: Hi all - can we setup a time for IPS track participants to interface with the SMART Health Cards for Vaccination and Testing track? Goal would be to review the SHC FHIR IG profiles for patient, immunizations and lab tests (observations) in comparison to the IPS profiles. We would like feedback on the IG and particularly the terminology gaps between the profiles. @Paul Denning @Yunwei Wang @Max Masnick
@Neelima Karipineni Good timing. I was just looking at checking with you about that.
Do you have an idea of when to do it?
1pm to 2pm ET is bad for me
When is good?
Our track report out today starts at 4:30PM ET (8:30P UTC). How does 3PM ET work then?
I have a meeting with ONC scheduled from 3:00-3:30. But that would still give us an hour before your 4:30 meeting, so I think if we can make that adjustment that will work (at least for me).
3:30 should be fine. We can use the SHC Zoom for the breakout if that works, anyone who is interested in participating can just join at 3:30P ET.
Sounds good
Yes, that's great. We probably should get this on Whova and have it listed for both tracks.
Just submitted a new session in Confluence and notified Sandy.
Excellent. I had let Mary Ann know that it was coming.
It's in Whova now.
Following-up on setting up a breakout for tomorrow - can we aim for 3:30P ET again?

@Neelima Karipineni Apologies for not responding earlier. It looks like that time is going to be difficult for me personally. My meeting with ONC that was supposed to happen yesterday has been moved to 3:30 today. And I have a personal item to accompany my mother at an appointment at 4:30. With the other IPS sessions this afternoon I do have 30 min. available at 3:00 PM EDT, and also 30 min. at 1:30 EDT, but that looks like about it for me. Not sure how it is for the rest of the group. Maybe we do it at 3:00 PM EDT, if that works for you, and then I can drop (or multitask) after the first 30 minutes?
3.00 pm EDT overlaps with the HL7 International Council meeting (but this is a problem just for few of us :-) )
Does IC end at 3:30? Or when?

Just spoke with Max who we want to be attending on our side - of those times, 1:30P ET would be the best for him. He is not free at 3:00P ET but 3:30P ET is okay. It seems like 1:30P ET might be better given the overlap with IC. Does that work?

@Neelima Karipineni We have a session that ends at 1:30, and the regular IPS Cross-SDO meeting that begins at 2:00 PM EDT. Let's go ahead and do it at 1:30, either for only 30 min, or we can have it go longer but some of us who need to drop and switch to the other call can do that.
Sounds good. Will submit an agenda item for 1:30P ET then. Thanks.
Thanks for joining folks - link to Max's summary document https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PHWG/2021-05-19+Working+session+with+IPS
